mapper.select: SELECT dr.document_category type, count(1) count FROM sys_wfl_document_ref dr WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_approval_chain ac WHERE ac.approver_oid = #{userOid} AND ac.status = 1000 AND ac.current_flag = 1 AND ac.entity_oid = dr.document_oid AND ac.entity_type = dr.document_category ) GROUP BY dr.document_category
